overview: Page Mailliard is an associate in the corporate and securities practice at Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati. Her practice primarily focuses on advising both public and private companies on a broad range of securities laws and other issues. This includes representing clients in a wide variety of transactions, including equity private placements, mergers and acquisitions, asset sales, strategic alliances, and public equity offerings. Additionally, she has extensive experience counseling both public and private clients on general corporate and compliance matters.
